notes.dark_mode_implementation: The project uses Tailwind CSS dark: prefix for dark mode. Most gaps are missing dark: variants on text colors (gray-900 -> dark:gray-100) and backgrounds (bg-white -> dark:bg-gray-800).
notes.responsive_design: The project has good responsive breakpoints with sm:, md:, lg:, xl: variants. Main issues are missing md: breakpoints in some grid layouts.
notes.color_scheme: Primary colors use blue/purple gradients, secondary colors use green/orange. Dark mode uses gray-800 for primary dark background and gray-900 for dark page background.
notes.testing_notes: All files use the useApp() context to access isDark for dynamic styling in addition to Tailwind dark: prefix
